properties.address: Life Centre, 711-715 Wimborne Road,, Bournemouth, Dorset BH9 2AU
properties.description: Our warm welcome hub is called 'Lifehouse' and has been in operation for around 14years now. We are also a foodbank and signposting agency and offer Community Money Advice help. We are a warm friendly space where you can just drop in for a drink and chat

properties.description: Our focus is providing a warm spaces for families with children but all are welcome. Chilli Tuesday - warm space, hot food and time together.
